prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If candidates are provided, you MUST choose one of them (even if it slightly overshoots quantity) and justify the pick—never return null when at least one candidate exists.
        Only when no candidates are supplied may you set `selected_product_id` to null, and those notes must begin with `MISSING_SKU:` so the pipeline can flag the meal for removal.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json
        {
  "uid": "arch_FamMedOvenBakes_001",
  "name": "Family Mediterranean Oven Bakes (Italian/Spanish/Portuguese)",
  "core_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "Italian",
      "Spanish",
      "Portuguese"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "30to60"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "Oven"
    ],
    "MealComponentPreference": [
      "FromScratch"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "None"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "Spanish-Portuguese Chicken and Potato Tray Bake",
  "description": "Family-sized roasted chicken thighs with potatoes, peppers, and a mild paprika-tomato glaze. Hands-off oven bake with bright lemon and herbs.",
  "servings": "Serves 4",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Preheat oven to 220°C (425°F).",
    "Scrub and cut potatoes into 2–3 cm chunks.",
    "Slice bell peppers into strips and onion into wedges.",
    "Finely chop garlic.",
    "Zest and halve the lemon; chop parsley.",
    "Set out a large rimmed baking tray."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "Warm a small pan over medium heat (StoveTop). Add olive oil, garlic, paprika, oregano, and tomato and onion mix; stir 2–3 minutes until fragrant, then remove from heat.",
    "On the baking tray, toss potatoes, bell peppers, and onion with half the warm paprika-tomato oil and a big pinch of sea salt and pepper. Spread in an even layer.",
    "Nestle chicken thighs skin-side up on top. Brush or spoon the remaining paprika-tomato oil over the chicken. Add lemon halves (cut-side up) to the tray.",
    "Roast on the middle rack for 40–45 minutes, until chicken skin is crisp, juices run clear, and potatoes are tender (internal temp 75°C/167°F).",
    "Squeeze roasted lemon over the tray, scatter parsley and lemon zest, and adjust sea salt and pepper to taste.",
    "Rest 5 minutes, then serve straight from the tray."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "chicken thighs",
      "quantity": "6–8 pieces (about 1.2–1.4 kg)",
      "preparation": "patted dry"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "potatoes",
      "quantity": "900 g",
      "preparation": "cut into chunks"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "bell peppers",
      "quantity": "2 large",
      "preparation": "sliced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "onion",
      "quantity": "1 large",
      "preparation": "cut into wedges"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic",
      "quantity": "3 cloves",
      "preparation": "finely chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "olive oil",
      "quantity": "3 tablespoons",
      "preparation": ""
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "paprika",
      "quantity": "2 teaspoons",
      "preparation": ""
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "oregano",
      "quantity": "1 teaspoon",
      "preparation": ""
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "tomato and onion mix",
      "quantity": "1/2 cup (120 ml)",
      "preparation": ""
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "sea salt",
      "quantity": "1–1.5 teaspoons, to taste",
      "preparation": ""
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "pepper",
      "quantity": "1/2 teaspoon, to taste",
      "preparation": ""
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "lemon",
      "quantity": "1",
      "preparation": "zested and halved"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "parsley",
      "quantity": "2 tablespoons",
      "preparation": "chopped"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "Portuguese",
      "Spanish"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "30to60"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "None"
    ],
    "NutritionFocus": [
      "HighProtein"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "Oven",
      "StoveTop"
    ],
    "MealComponentPreference": [
      "FromScratch",
      "SemiPrepared"
    ]
  }
}
        ```
